edu.ncsu.csc216.garage.model.service_garage

Class ServiceBay

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.garage.model.service_garage.ServiceBay
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HybridElectricBay

    public class ServiceBay
extends java.lang.Object
    Class defines state and behavior for ServiceBay objects to be held and manipulated by Garage class. ServiceBay knows whether it is occupied and knows what Vehicle it currently holds. Behavior is provided for filling and emptying bays with Vehicles.
    Author:
    Nick Garner

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String bayID
      Unique identification for bay
      private Vehicle myVehicle
      Vehicle object currently in this bay
      private static int nextNumber
      Used to construct bayID for next bay to open
      private boolean occupied
      Tracks if bay is occupied

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ServiceBay()
      Constructs a ServiceBay with bayID based on nextNumber
      ServiceBay(java.lang.String prefix)
      Constructs a new ServiceBay with bayID corresponding to the given prefix and nextNumber.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getBayID()
      Returns the bay's ID as a String
      boolean isOccupied()
      Returns true if the bay is currently occupied by a Vehicle
      void occupy(Vehicle v)
      Checks if bay is occupied and updates myVehicle to param if not.
      Vehicle release()
      Resets myVehicle to null and occupied to false, and returns the Vehicle that was occupying this ServiceBay.
      static void startBayNumberingAt101()
      Static method to reset the first bayID to 101.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ServiceBay

        public ServiceBay()
        Constructs a ServiceBay with bayID based on nextNumber

      • ServiceBay

        public ServiceBay(java.lang.String prefix)
        Constructs a new ServiceBay with bayID corresponding to the given prefix and nextNumber. If no prefix given, default prefix is 1.
        Parameters:
        prefix - Start of the bayID for this ServiceBay object.

    • Method Detail

      • startBayNumberingAt101

        public static void startBayNumberingAt101()
        Static method to reset the first bayID to 101. Used for testing.

      • getBayID

        public java.lang.String getBayID()
        Returns the bay's ID as a String
        Returns:
        Returns the bay's ID as a String

      • isOccupied

        public boolean isOccupied()
        Returns true if the bay is currently occupied by a Vehicle
        Returns:
        True if the bay is currently occupied by a Vehicle

      • release

        public Vehicle release()
        Resets myVehicle to null and occupied to false, and returns the Vehicle that was occupying this ServiceBay.
        Returns:
        Returns the Vehicle that was occupying this ServiceBay.

      • occupy

        public void occupy(Vehicle v)
            throws BayOccupiedException,
                   BayCarMismatchException
        Checks if bay is occupied and updates myVehicle to param if not.
        Parameters:
        v - Vehicle to occupy ServiceBay with.
        Throws:
        BayOccupiedException - If bay is already occupied by another Vehicle.
        BayCarMismatchException - If RegularCar attempts to occupy a HybridElectricBay.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns string representation of the ServiceBay. If empty, shows bayID and Empty. If occupied, shows bayID and owner and license of Vehicle.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
